title: AI Personalized Study Plan
description: Let our AI analyze your performance and create a custom study plan to help you focus on your weak areas.

form.title: Generate Your Plan
form.description: Provide some details about your study history and preferences to get started.

history.label: Your Study History
history.placeholder: Provide your question history in JSON format.
history.description: Enter your past performance (correct/incorrect answers on topics).

syllabus.label: Syllabus
syllabus.description: The syllabus for the KARTET exam.

language.label: Preferred Language
language.description: The language for your study plan.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your personalized study plan has been generated.

saved.title: Saved!
saved.description: Study plan saved to your library.
